property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a page counter on Private Research. When enchanted creature dies, draw a card for each page counter on Private Research.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays 1 for each card revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Treachery enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands. You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The academy educates; I employ. It's a perfect arrangement."—Gatha, Tolarian renegade

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Flying
When you control no enchantments, sacrifice Tethered Griffin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Poorly trained griffins sometimes attack the noble audiences that gather to watch their progress.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From each seed, a world. From each world, a thousand seeds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste. At the beginning of the end step, return Mark of Fury to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many Keldon warriors bear the mark of intentional insanity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Reliquary Monk dies, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A thing of Serra's realm exists only by the grace of her followers' faith.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Aura Thief dies, you gain control of all enchantments. (You don't get to move Auras.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Illusion steals reality from the unwise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps a Swamp for mana, that player adds Ć to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The muck claims a hundred living things for each meager treasure it spews forth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land and all other lands with the same name as that land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Land charred black, rivers boiled,Crops and wells alike despoiled,Mountains leveled, forests felled—Footprints of the beasts of Keld.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo 4 (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the invasion drew closer, Urza's means began to resemble Phyrexia's end.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two target lands on top of their owners' libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To renew the land, plow the land. To destroy the land, do nothing.—Druids' saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn. Cycling 2 (2, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best defense is to not get hit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. 2, Sacrifice Capashen Standard: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Benalia has no need for peacocks to serve as symbols of vanity. The Capashens strut more proudly than any bird.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card. You may draw an additional card if Rayne, Academy Chancellor is enchanted.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Chime of Night is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many sent to serve Davvol carried such instruments, as if to remind him who their true masters were.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player gains control of target permanent you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Campus pranksters initiate new students with the old "beeble bomb" routine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ć, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will trade life for life with the insurgents. Our resources, unlike theirs, are limitless."—Davvol, Evincar of Rath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Add Ĉ to your mana pool for each Forest you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Being one would be an honor, if the word "honor" had any meaning in Phyrexia.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an opponent has 10 or less life, if Lurking Jackals is an enchantment, it becomes a 3/2 Hound creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Often it's not the hunter or the hunted but the opportunist who thrives in Rath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Add Ĉ to your mana pool. 2, Sacrifice Heart Warden: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In Llanowar, we tend the forest's boughs and branches. In Yavimaya, we are a part of them."—Rofellos of Llanowar

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Reckless Abandon, sacrifice a creature. Reckless Abandon deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The climax of a warlord's career is always death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +0/+5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their commitment to Serra is as solid as any shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. 2, Sacrifice Illuminated Wings: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a moment, Urza thought not of war and destruction, but of the freedom of the skies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Gardener dies, destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Grow food in dirt? Save time—eat dirt."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ć, Ċ, Sacrifice Apprentice Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When False Prophet dies, exile all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You lived for Serra's love. Will you not die for it?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Storage Matrix is untapped, each player chooses artifact, creature, or land during his or her untap step. That player can untap only permanents of the chosen type this step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Marker Beetles dies, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. 2, Sacrifice Marker Beetles: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In case of emergency, crush bug.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Academy Rector dies, you may exile it. If you do, search your library for an enchantment card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Ċ: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An angel's touch can prepare a soldier for battle more than a thousand military drills.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller may search his or her library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield. If that player does, he or she shuffles his or her library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gatha showed remarkable prowess in increasing his subjects' stature. Their lifespans, however, were another matter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Masons dies, destroy target Wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Goblins build with true zeal—and anything else within arm's reach."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo 2Ĉ (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Hunting Moa enters the battlefield or dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, Sacrifice Brass Secretary: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The students disliked the secretary for its unfailing memory—until they discovered it couldn't dodge thrown objects.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2Ą, Ċ: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2Ć, Ċ: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature attacks, Caltrops deals 1 damage to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Toward the end, Gatha struggled to keep his experiments in and his patrons out.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Disease Carriers dies, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rath is a disease all its inhabitants carry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped creature you control: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Commanders order soldiers to attack. Field surgeons order them to heal. Both are obeyed without question.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all enchantments. You gain 2 life for each enchantment destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is my place of power. Nothing can take root here unless I allow it."—Multani, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all Keld's warriors are found on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Students who had seen Rayne argue with Urza were certain she had summoned it to make him seem warmer by comparison.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most spiders wait patiently for their prey to arrive. Most spiders aren't forty feet tall.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gamekeeper dies, you may exile it. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, Ċ, Sacrifice Braidwood Sextant: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Masticore unless you discard a card. 2: Masticore deals 1 damage to target creature. 2: Regenerate Masticore.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3, Ċ: Choose a number greater than 0 and a color. Target opponent reveals his or her hand. If that opponent reveals exactly the chosen number of cards of the chosen color, you draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2: Mantis Engine gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) 2: Mantis Engine gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tawnos left a legacy of animal designs in many of Urza's creations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Wall of Glare can block any number of creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The blinding barrier served Benalia better than a hundred shields.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I think it no accident that every civilized people has discovered the art of distillation."—Rofellos of Llanowar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other non-Aura enchantment is a creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. It's still an enchantment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For all the priceless tomes they have destroyed, one would think they would taste better."—Davvol, Evincar of Rath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard. Cycling 2 (2, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The grave robbers arrived the day after the burial. They were a day too late.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonbasic land card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The rate of spread in this region is unacceptable. Start again."—Davvol, Evincar of Rath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fledgling Osprey has flying as long as it's enchanted.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It isn't truly born until its first flight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the coldest hearts and the strongest stomachs can stand against it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from black and from red.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The archangels zealously drove Serra's light into every corner of their new home as if their creator still commanded them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, Æther Sting deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Gatha fell, he was called to account for each abomination he created.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flame Jet deals 3 damage to target player. Cycling 2 (2, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Did the land make the Keldons? Did the Keldons make the land? Or were they simply meant for each other?

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The seed torches' pollen gives off light, but the elves find it heightens their senses as well.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Arrows are only one way to remove an enemy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Urza says he's sane. Perhaps, but measures of sanity among planeswalkers are hard to come by."—Barrin

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins don't know the meaning of the word "tactics"—or the word "meaning," for that matter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ, Sacrifice a creature: Bloodshot Cyclops deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After their first encounter, the goblins named him Chuck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Telepathic Spies enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do try to keep an open mind, would you?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1ą, Discard a card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barrin drowned his doubts about Urza's project by delving ever deeper into its details.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rain from this storm leaves you pinned to the ground like an insect.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying 2, Sacrifice Slinking Skirge: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Davvol encouraged the skirges; they made excellent sentries and were quite edible if properly seasoned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target nontoken permanent, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Who is truer: you who are, or you who are to be?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a masterful quilter, Yavimaya stitches together patches of color to warn its denizens of threats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ąąą, Ċ: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of course she's at the head of her class. All her classmates have disappeared."—Gatha, Tolarian renegade

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice Emperor Crocodile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As no one has ever accepted a second invitation to Davvol's table, the evincar often dines alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent taps a Mountain for mana, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To forgive our enemies is to forgive ourselves."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Plague Dogs dies, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn. 2, Sacrifice Plague Dogs: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metathran Elite is unblockable as long as it's enchanted.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If the eyes are windows to the soul, their souls are not of this world.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You'll never get a Keldon's goat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target nonbasic land. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that land and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target nonblack creature. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that creature and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Return an enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand for each card revealed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rise, elf. We are both of Gaea, and thus we are equal."—Multani, to Rofellos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack, but when to stop.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on Incendiary. When enchanted creature dies, Incendiary deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of fuse counters on Incendiary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Thran Golem is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and has flying, first strike, and trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Karn felt more secure about his value to Urza when he realized he didn't need regular trimming.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Behind his eyes is the pain of every soldier his hands have healed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mountainwalk ć: Colos Yearling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A steed grows with its rider.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice any number of Mountains. Landslide deals that much damage to target player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Kingfisher dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's tastiest when served with the fish it stole.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 4, Ċ, Sacrifice a creature: Fodder Cannon deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Step 1: Find your cousin.Step 2: Get your cousin in the cannon.Step 3: Find another cousin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures able to block Taunting Elf do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Much to Multani's chagrin, Rofellos gleefully tutored Yavimaya's elves on the rudest and most vulgar words spoken in Llanowar.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2Ĉ, Ċ: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Keldons' ogre campaign provided more body parts than my meager facility could properly use."—Gatha, Tolarian renegade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an infection counter on Festering Wound. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Festering Wound deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of infection counters on Festering Wound.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an arrow counter on Archery Training. Enchanted creature has "Ċ: This creature deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature, where X is the number of arrow counters on Archery Training."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Next to Law is Duty, and Duty must be obeyed. If the frame of Duty is broken, none shall weave life's fabric."—Song of All, canto 167

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Next to Grace is Reason, and Reason must be retained. If the web of Reason comes unwoven, madness will escape."—Song of All, canto 167

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Skip your draw step.
Pay 1 life: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ĉ: Regenerate Ancient Silverback. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexian killing machines couldn't have known the seriousness of their mistake in wounding the ape—they'd never seen it angry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When you control no artifacts, sacrifice Covetous Dragon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gatha survived as long as he did by giving all Keld's predators exactly what they wanted.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The balance of nature dictates that one day humans will be stepped on by bugs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rayne once made several unkind comparisons between the bird's naked opportunism and Urza's.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Junk Diver dies, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Add 3 to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza's metathran children were conceived, birthed, and nurtured by an integrated system of machines.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Ċ, Exile Thran Foundry: Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What we do not use up, we use again."—Urza

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life and add Ć to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘Davvol, blast those elves.' ‘Davvol, transport those troops.' No one cares that today is my birthday."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Urza, I've discovered more promising students than you and my husband have, combined. And I haven't lost a single one."—Rayne, Academy Chancellor

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2: Goblin Festival deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, choose one of your opponents. That player gains control of Goblin Festival.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike 1Ą: Capashen Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few warriors dare to challenge a knight of Capashen. Should one do so, there is one fewer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target enchantment. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that enchantment and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bubbling Beebles is unblockable as long as defending player controls an enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Chancellor Rayne canceled the annual beeble roast. I should have married a crueler woman."—Barrin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Auras with nothing to enchant remain in your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Treasures, trinkets, trash—the relics of the past are brought forth again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature ą: Return enchanted creature and Disappear to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If at first you don't succeed, run away and hide.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that spell and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a growth counter on Momentum. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each growth counter on Momentum.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Urza's Incubator enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creature spells of the chosen type cost 2 less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stop thinking like an artificer, Urza, and start thinking like a father"—Rayne, Academy Chancellor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Echo 2ćć (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Keldon Champion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target player.

property.value: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Scent of Cinder deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. 2, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This is a world of spiteful wasps that sting and kill even as they die.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a black card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fruit must rot before its seed can sprout.—Yavimaya saying

property.name: Rules
property.value:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on Powder Keg.
Ċ, Sacrifice Powder Keg: Destroy each artifact and creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of fuse counters on Powder Keg.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ą: Capashen Templar gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their shields are Benalia's outermost battlements.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target artifact. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that artifact and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

property.value: Echo 2ć (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Keldon Vandals enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldons divide all their spoils into two groups: trophies and catapult ammunition.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2ć, Ċ: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Cinder Seer deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's end step, if that player didn't cast a spell this turn, Impatience deals 2 damage to him or her.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ask a Keldon to hold his temper and you'll be left holding your guts.

Ċ: Add 1 to your mana pool.
Ĉ, Ċ: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For all its traps and defenses, Yavimaya has its havens, too.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Horror.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This monstrosity will do—for now."—Davvol, Evincar of Rath

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as Serra crafted angels of light and faith, Urza constructed an army of sorcery and power to resist the coming invasion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Iridescent Drake enters the battlefield, put target Aura card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control attached to Iridescent Drake.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player skips his or her next draw step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mind if I just lie down right here for a few weeks?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Reveal any number of artifact cards in your hand. Add 2 to your mana pool for each card revealed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At this rate I fully expect to be replaced by a clockwork golem by year's end."—Barrin

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Falling from heaven is not as painful as surviving the impact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ĉ, Ċ: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more.—Elvish teaching

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Body Snatcher enters the battlefield, exile it unless you discard a creature card. When Body Snatcher dies, exile Body Snatcher and return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2ą, Ċ: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays 1 for each card revealed this way.
